statement.p: In 39.53 of the last 43 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{43}}={0.3953}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{43}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3953}\cdot{43}={16.9979}. We round that as requested to 17 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
